website_summaries.verdict: Easily the best way to play Minecraft on the go, the New Nintendo 3DS Edition features the core Minecraft experience, despite being an exclusively single-player game.
pros: Innovative use of the touch screen
Includes 2 texture packs and 5 skin packs
Excellent visuals, even on the small screen
cons: This version of Minecraft is only playable on the New Nintendo 3DS series of handhelds

product_meta.title: Minecraft: New Nintendo 3DS Edition - New 3DS [Digital Code]
product_meta.description:
Platform:New 3DS Digital Code| Edition:Standard

Create. Explore. Survive.
Minecraft is a game about placing blocks and going on adventures.
Only playable on the New Nintendo 3DS series.
Explore randomly‐generated worlds and build amazing things from the simplest of homes to the grandest of castles. Play in Creative Mode with unlimited resources or mine deep into the world in survival mode, crafting weapons and armor to fend off the dangerous mobs.Create and explore your very own world where the only limit is what you can imagine.Includes five skin packs and two texture packs to customize your gameplay!Use the touch screen to check your map or manage your inventory!

System Requirements: * Supported Platforms:Nintendo - New 3DS


Nintendo account required for game activation and installation
